name: Visual Effects Plugin
description: Enhance your website with a variety of visual effects to improve readability and user interaction. This plugin adds a customizable toolbar allowing users to apply effects such as grayscale, invert colors, sepia, and more, directly to your site's pages.
author: htejera

messageInOptions.text: Customize the visual effects toolbar appearance and functionality directly from these settings.

config.name: parentSelector
config.label: Parent Element Selector
config.note: CSS selector of the element to append the visual effects toolbar. Default is 'body'.

config.name: comboPosition
config.label: Combo Box Position
config.note: Position of the combo box on the screen (right or left).

config.name: language
config.label: Language
config.note: Select the language for the plugin interface. Default is English.

config.name: grayscaleValue
config.label: Grayscale Filter Value
config.note: The intensity of the grayscale effect (0% to 100%). Default is 100%.

config.name: invertValue
config.label: Invert Filter Value
config.note: The intensity of the invert effect (0% to 100%). Default is 100%.

config.name: sepiaValue
config.label: Sepia Filter Value
config.note: The intensity of the sepia effect (0% to 100%). Default is 100%.
